title: Australia - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Good profile to support visa application.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Passport: Original Passport with validity of a minimum of six months after the intended date of departure and a minimum of two blank pages for visa stamp
Australia Visa Application Form: The form is online-based, no need to sign by the applicant.
Covering Letter: Covering Letter from the applicant
Invitation Letter: Invitation letter from the Australian host.
Proof of Occupation : Please mention Trade License or NOC, Salary Slips from the office.
If you ever get refused in any country – if yes mention the country’s name/ year and the reason.

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.The total approximate processing time is 30-60 days (Time may vary depending on the applicant’s profile and the embassy’s actual processing time)
